meanings.def: a person or an organization that has control of money or property that has been put into a trust for somebody
examples: The bank will act as trustees for the estate until the child is 18.
They act as joint trustees of the fund.
They hold the land as trustees for the infant.
executor and trustee to the estate of his sister

meanings.def: a member of a group of people that controls the financial affairs and decides the policy of a charity or other organization
examples: the trustees of the National Gallery
